entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Proposal: use ValueTask<TItem> in CacheExtensions.GetOrCreateAsync #67069
  • Disabled roslyn-analyzers subscription #67068
  • Make helpers for run-time OpenSSL version checks for the portable shim #67064
    Future
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeInformation package lacks type forwarding facade #67063
  • .NET 7 osx-arm64 single-file crashing with sigsegv #67062
  • Estimated signature size calculation for ECDsa and RSA may be incorrect #67059
  • Infra issue (deadletter) in CI `runtime-staging (Build Browser wasm release Browser_wasm_Windows)` in 6.0 #67058
  • Determine if there are further sets to special-case in RegexCompiler / source generator #67056
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Convert.FromBase64String to support ReadOnlySpan<char> input #67055
  • [API Proposal]: Add `AssemblyBuilder.ManifestModuleBuilder` and obsolete `AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule`. #67053
  • StreamPipeReader should override CompleteAsync #67050
    Future
  • Backport Move to Windows.10.Amd64.Server2022.ES.Open to 6.0 #67048
  • [Mono]: Interop/MonoAPI/MonoMono PInvokeDetach+Thunks+InstallEHCallback fails on Mono Windows. #67047
  • Assert failure: !CREATE_CHECK_STRING(pMT && pMT->Validate()) #67046
    7.0.0
  • Remove JIT-workaround for eliminating bound check #67044
  • SystemIcons outdated? #67040
  • Vector.ConditionalSelect and Vector128.ConditionalSelect don't emit vpblendvb on x64 #67039
    7.0.0
  • new Vector<T> for byte, short emits vpbroadcastd thus needs an imul #67038
  • Android test failed with DEVICE_NOT_FOUND #67032
  • Segmentation fault in LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests #67031
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Indexing with expression does not work #67029
  • Test failure JIT\\SIMD\\DivSignedUnsignedTest_r\\DivSignedUnsignedTest_r.cmd #67019

Closed

  • Test failure baseservices\\TieredCompilation\\BasicTestWithMcj\\BasicTestWithMcj.cmd #66917
    7.0.0
  • The Parallel.ForEachAsync propagates OperationCanceledException of unknown origin #66695
    7.0.0
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGeneration #66927
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'IsBaselineSimdIsaSupportedDebugOnly()' #66205
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\VS-ia64-JIT\\V2.0-Beta2\\b311420\\b311420\\b311420.cmd #66969
  • Why System.DirectoryServices.Protocols not working on linux? #64900
  • Confusing environment variable configuration prefix behaviour reintroduced in 6.0.2 #65756
    7.0.0
  • JsonNode/JsonObject not differentiating between missing property and null-value #66948
  • microsoft.xmlserializer.generator.6.0.0.nupkg fails to upload to nuget.server #66584
    7.0.0
  • Comment and implementation mismatch in impTypeIsAssignable #67026
    Future
  • NativeAOT: Crash with assertion during obj file emit. #63779
    Future
  • Implementing async/await using source generators #65540
  • [HTTP/3] Add ClientCertificates API #56362
    7.0.0
  • [regions] use the used range in the regions allocator for the heap range #50983
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix loop cloning for OSR #67067
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add arm64 cross-arch msi installers #67066
    area-Setup
  • Update coding-style to include target-typed new() guideline #67061
    area-Meta
  • Update the latest node for markdownlint #67060
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Android] Re-enable System.Security.Cryptography tests #67057
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Move to Windows.10.Amd64.Server2022.ES.Open #67054
    area-Infrastructure
  • Expose the custom type marshalling types for source-generated interop. #67052
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][emsdk] Update these packages manually #67051
    arch-wasm
  • Optimized string.Replace(char, char) #67049
    community-contribution
  • Fix ReferenceHandler test failures when enabling small buffer async in tests #67041
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Do not call into MsQuic inside a lock #67037
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add QuicConnection.IsSupported #67036
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Ensure Sync stream serialization is handling IAsyncEnumerable correctly #67035
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Add dynamic shim for SSL_CTX_set_options and SSL_set_options #67030
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Enable string properties evaluation: Length + Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add a --aot-lazy-assembly-load command line option to load assemblies… #67024
    tenet-performance, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Disable multi-level lookup by default #67022
    area-Host, 7.0.0
  • Add ReplenishingRateLimiter and IdleDuration #67020
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

Merged

  • System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource: Perf improvement for System.Diagnostics.Enumerator<T> #67012
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Improves handling of env prefixes containing __ #65757
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-Configuration, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.EventSource` #66802
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Fix nullable annotations in `EventSourceLogger` #67065
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Eat cancellation exceptions from WaitAsync in Parallel.ForEachAsync #66712
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Optimize generic sharing for generic methods. #64129
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove unnecessary XmlQualifiedName allocations from XsdBuilder.ProcessElement/Attribute #67045
    area-System.Xml, tenet-performance
  • Avoid bool[] allocation in MemberInfoCache.PopulateProperties #66912
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance
  • Improve nullable annotations for `ILogger.BeginScope` #66960
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Remove libunwind disabled warnings. #67042
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Ensure that fgMorphFieldToSimdGetElement doesn't call gtNewSimdGetElementNode if the ISA is unsupported #66853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Give end-marker symbols their own addresses to work around a linker bug #66999
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add Fedora 37 RID #67021
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Add the CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute type to make it easier to identify marshaller types #65591
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Change CoreCLR diagnostic resource production to remove cross-component build dependency #67018
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Workaround NuGet error in Content_Types #66744
    area-Serialization
  • Delete System.Runtime.Experimental leftovers #66819
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove delegate/closure allocations from DynamicAssemblies.IsTypeDynamic #66797
    area-System.Xml, tenet-performance
  • [mono][interp] Enable some tests #66947
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Support using the system version of brotli #66462
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Reject mismatched symbol files #67027
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [arm64] JIT: Better addressing modes around bytes #66902
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete create-codespaces-prebuild.yml #67015
    area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add metrics for caching #66479
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • Add vectorized paths for Span<T>.Reverse #64412
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey #66918
    area-Microsoft.Win32, tenet-performance
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • Memory containment for `FIELD_LIST` operands on x86 #65803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.TraceSource` #66892
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Debug` #66862
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [No review] NativeAOT CoreCLR testing #65491
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][aot] Run the high resource AOT tests on build machine itself #67017
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Replace bool[] arrays with Span<bool> in XML deserialization #66914
    area-Serialization, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Use the stapled OCSP response from TLS, when available. #67011
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • Leaf level AOT annotation for CoreLib library #66976
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve vectorization of String.Split #64899
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Cleaned up code #66981
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add timestamp-based expiration to cached SafeFreeCredentials #66334
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add reciprocal and SinCos methods to IFloatingPoint #59521
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize DateTimeOffset #58169
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Ensure that InstructionSetFlags are correctly fixed up for unmatched VM #64158
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Multiple enveloped signatures #67010
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Don't apply IMAGE_REL_BASED_REL32 when address doesn't belong to current section #66855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Methods on primitives 65707 #66654
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Debuger tests refactor 63667 #63730
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve `CreateDirectory` on Windows #66754
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • FileSystem: MoveDirectory: some improvements. #65132
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Use ROS<byte> instead of byte[] where it makes sense on S.S.C.Cose #66741
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add additional trace to HttpConnectionPool #66958
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Improve `QuicImplementationProviders.MsQuic.IsSupported` for TLS1.3 On Windows #66019
    area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • Double Vector128 for SpanHelpers.IndexOf(byte,byte,int) on ARM64 #66993
    area-System.Memory
  • Fixes #66141: ConfigurationBinder and ISet #66151
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Delete AssemblyBuilderData and ModuleBuilderData #66996
    area-System.Reflection
  • Managed implementation of NTLM for Android and tvOS #66879
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Add Fedora 37 RID #65392
    NO-MERGE, area-Host, community-contribution
  • CoreCLR runtime tests on Mono Windows x64. #64281
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Infra for regeneration of third-party-notices file #60091
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Use shared SocketAddress code in QUIC #66794
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [wasm] Dead code removal, minor fixes #66418
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Cache several char[] allocations in System.Private.Xml library methods #67001
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Use stackalloc in System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.NumberFormatterBase.ConvertToAlphabetic #67003
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [debugger][wasm] ValueTypeClass refactoring. #63626
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Replace 2 allocations from string.ToCharArray() with ReadOnlySpan in System.Private.Xml library #67002
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Fix hanging of NamedPipeClientStream when connecting with infinite timeout #66877
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Remove one string allocation in XmlTextEncoder by using stackalloc span and TryFormat #67005
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Avoid name collision for covariant and hidden properties (#63443) #63823
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [Draft]Use ValueStringBuilder in Encode/DecodeName #65893
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Added tests for changing a list size being iterated on (#65608) #65615
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Transition the x86 backend to use SSE for fp arithmetic. #65723
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Refactor suggested in 65842 #66821
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add support for creating delegates to static virtual methods #66936
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Reenable crossgen2 promotion outside version bubble #66983
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Perform reachability analysis before codegen #66967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixes #42643 allow keys with colons in JSON config #66886
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Avoid issuing connection attempts for already cancelled requests #66992
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging perf/wasm/aot #66973
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm
  • Remove the Unix code from `System.Drawing.Common`. #64623
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Initial version with the following features: #61926
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add almalinux support #62184
    area-Host
  • CI matrix change: Windows #58989
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.7 #67006
    area-Build-mono
  • Enable QJFL and OSR by default for x64 and arm64 #65675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update breaking-change-rules.md #66978
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Fix cancel in PipeReader.ReadAtLeastAsync #66870
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Pipelines, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] Project compiling failing with System.BadImageFormatException #1882

PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Support for GT_DIV and GT_CAST( dbl->lng) #1867

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • `<GeneratePackageOnBuild>` causes `dotnet pack` to fail #24318
  • msbuild silently ignores workload pack import, if the expected version of the pack is not found #21032
    6.0.3xx
  • `dotnet new android` attempts to restore Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-arm64 #19891
    6.0.3xx
  • [6.0.200-preview.22055.15] `dotnet tool run ...` will "hang" if the requested tool is not installed #23687
    6.0.3xx
  • `dotnet run` with invalid framework and `--` goes into infinite loop #23034
    6.0.3xx
  • Provide better experience when the dotnet version installed with VS and the available .NET MAUI version don't match #23295
  • Solved by install this update from WU catalog: #23314

Updated

  • Add --configfile switch to dotnet list package #24004
    Backlog
  • Workloads should be able to control the relative import order of .props and .targets #22358
    6.0.4xx
  • MSBuild AvailablePlatforms property should include arm64 #23994
  • Workloads: Detect and wait for active installs #19770
    7.0.1xx
  • Workloads: Ensure commands are atomic #19773
    7.0.1xx
  • Some tests fail on Linux (CI doesn't run all tests) #19783
    7.0.1xx
  • Concurrent workload commands uninstall each other #20094
    7.0.1xx
  • Repair causes fatal exception when you add the metadata file for MSI to a applocal file based installation #20096
    6.0.4xx
  • Localization of "description" field of manifest file #20497
    6.0.4xx
  • ⚡ Add --version and --version-prefix to dotnet build and dotnet pack, please #22840
  • When installing or updating workloads, better handle flaky network connectivity #20617
    6.0.4xx
  • NuGet.targets incorrectly performs a url-decode on filesystem paths, resulting in projects not found #20901
    6.0.4xx
  • Workload resolver should check for WorkloadManifest.json file instead of just looking for a directory #21676
    6.0.4xx
  • Specifying both -f ... and -r ... to dotnet build fails to restore if multiple frameworks are present in the project file #21877
    6.0.4xx
  • dotnet publish output option copy old packages to the publish folder #22220
    6.0.4xx
  • M1 Apple Monterey: Dotnet tool not found in zsh shell #22588
    6.0.4xx
  • Trying to get the packages for MAUI with MSVS 2022 preview did not download #23921
  • dotnet tool restore --interactive hangs forever #24220
    8.0.1xx
  • dotnet tool install error installing when a private feed is in nuget.config #24140
    8.0.1xx
  • NETSDK1100 when building projects with multiple TargetFrameworks #23306
    Discussion
  • Need better logging for the native SDK resolver #15149
    7.0.1xx
  • .NET Core 6 Found multiple publish output files with the same relative path #22716
  • Attempting to codesign a MacOS app corrupts the app #24337
  • Cannot run dotnet core WinForms app on .Net 6.0 #24503
  • Build for musl 1.1.24 #24448
  • dotnet tool restore interactive doesn't prompt for DeviceFlow since .NET 6 SDK #22987
  • Form designer keep loading when targeting to .NET 7.0 #24389

PullRequests

Created

  • Change LastIndexOf to use invariant culture #24518
    Area-NetSDK
  • Update param in CoreGenerateSatelliteAssemblies #24514
    Area-ILLink
  • Detect arm64 hostfxr.dll #24512
    Area-Workloads

Merged

  • deploy common roslyn assemblies used by multiple dotnet tools #24169
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Change the missing workload message to recommend doing a restore. #24450
    Area-Workloads
  • Refactor some workload APIs #24488
    Area-Workloads
  • Error using skip-manifest-update and --from-rollback-file #24288
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1679097 #24395
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Hide manifest updates during workload install #24451
    Area-Workloads
  • Add default file inclusion support in .NET SDK for RESW and image files in WinAppSDK .NET projects. #24139
    Area-WebSDK
  • Update the hardcoded net5.0 to the current framework #23881
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Open question for semi auto properties (static local functions or lambdas containing `field`) #5923
  • Open questions in Required Members #5945

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Auto-default structs #5737
  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: "file private" visibility #5529
    Needs More Work
  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630
    Working Set
  • Champion "utf8 string literals" #184
    Backlog
  • Champion "readonly for locals and parameters" #188
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update pattern-variables.md #5781
  • Fix broken links #5943

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Convert to LINQ" refactoring suggestions ignore side effects in conditional #60355
  • Analyzer node missing source generator in solution explorer #60354
  • Renaming / refactoring positional record properties does not working when renamed in the parameter list. #60353
  • Transitive reference to System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager doesn't work in net6.0 project #60348
  • Binlogs / cmdline should include generator timing info #60347
  • Missing space between "internal" access modifier and "class" keyword when creating a new C# class when using File Scoped Namespaces as a VS default. #60345
  • Odd behaviour with async method declaration: wrong types suggestion #60341
  • Odd behaviour with async method declaration: bad keyword suggestion #60340
    Backlog
  • Odd behaviour with async method declaration: bad colorization #60339
  • Speculating with `nameof` doesn't produce a `NameOfBinder` leading to incorrect results #60337
    17.2
  • Incorrect line mappings generated for address of array element in 'fixed' statement #60336
    Compiler.Next
  • ref/out parameters in async methods with AsyncMethodBuilderAttribute #60332
    17.2

Closed

  • .NET Hot Reload concept of Reloadable Types needs to be added to capabilities check #59118
    17.2
  • Respect C# naming conventions when generating `record`'s members #60342
  • Can't debug roslyn analizers #60161
    17.2
  • Smart break line does not work with checked / unchecked blocks #60250
    17.2
  • "Convert to switch statement" refactoring generates invalid code #59616
    17.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Add EE tests for UTF8 String Literals. #60352
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Speed up VisualStudioProject construction #60351
    Area-IDE
  • Remove .git-blame-ignore-revs to avoid inaccurate blame on github #60350
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Follow up on Test Plan Review and PROTOTYPE comments for UTF8 String Literals feature. #60349
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Fix SymbolDisplay.FormatPrimitive #60346
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60344
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix nameof speculation #60343
    Area-Compilers
  • Respect C# naming conventions when generating parameter for record #60338
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support lambdas and local functions, eliminate duplicate code #60335
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • VSMac external access for types required to startup the roslyn LSP server #60330
    Area-IDE, LSP

Merged

  • Fix issue when multiple different diagnostics share a single fixer #60317
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add analyzer/fixer that notifies people about explicit (but hidden) casts the compiler generates for foreach-statements. #60120
    Area-IDE
  • Fix our x86 test execution #60323
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Allow VS Mac to access a few options and a helper method #60333
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [LSP] Don't adjust breakpoints when there are diagnostics in the document #60334
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60331
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add support for CheckedStatement for smart break line #60308
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove enableRoslynAnalyzers from codespace default settings #60203
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Initialize MEF parts before switching to the UI thread #60289
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Don't offer convert to switch when an implicit cast is present #60224
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #60329
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #60356
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't complete quotes if they complete a valid string #60227
    Area-IDE
  • Move more package initialization to BG. #60211
    Area-IDE
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
  • Create solution on the main thread in integration tests #58873
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support smart escaping of text when pasting into string expressions. #60036
    Area-IDE
  • Adjust DefiniteAssignmentPass.WriteConsideredUse for UTF8 String Literals. #60326
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Check accessibility before offering "Implement interface" codefix #60297
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Use synthesized methods for compiler-generated switch exceptions #59975
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1676641 #60325
    auto-merge
  • Updating our DiaSymReader.Native support #60290
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add FixAll in containing type/member support for code fixes #59989
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Fix top-level speculation #60274
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Improve error message for unmatched override that uses 'T?' #55624
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not run CI for non code files #60327
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Show linked symbol in Inheritance Margin #60225
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unreported telemetry #60321
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Some tests involving the W3CLoggerProcessor fail #40844
  • A new way to modify JsonOptions #40843
  • Is .net core compatible with IIS Webdav module ? #40838
  • Add description to ProducesResponseTypeAttribute #40836
  • Windows runtime installer contains .NET Framework EULA #40835

Closed

  • Allow all or specific parts or a Blazor Server application to be stateless (no continuous SignalR connection and state automatically moved out of memory after rendering) #40790
  • Change MIME type for .js extension to text/javascript #34323
    7.0-preview3
  • Create 6.0 BlazorWebAssemblyApp project with the command and run the "dotnet publish" command, for the first time meet error:'MSB4018: The "GetFileHash" task failed unexpectedly'. #40328
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Blazor] [WASM] Not being able to configure a custom query parameter on Login #40826

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support Global Exception Handling Mechanism for .NET MAUI #5535
  • Maui crashes when launching a new window in a new thread #5534
    6.0.300
  • [iOS] Type x:Double not found in xmlns http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2009/xaml #5531
  • Can't build for iOS simulators in p14, codesign exited with code 1 #5530
  • CarouselPage Migration #5526
  • OnIdiom don't work correct on Shell - FlyoutBehavior #5524
  • Html from Local File in Windows #5523
  • Navigation.PopModalAsync not working on iOS #5517
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • BlazorWebView's AllowSingleSignOnUsingOSPrimaryAccount defaults to false #5512
  • How to set app launch window size #5509
  • Shell.GotoAsync not working #5506
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • First time Picker selection (except 1st item) not working in iOS #5505
    6.0.300
  • Toolbar with Tabbed Pages in shell #5504

Closed

  • [Bug] Not rendering Shadows off-screen controls in ScrollView #2881
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Blazor Desktop tenets: Security #2540
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Blazor Desktop test infrastructure and plans #2543
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Windows]Flow direction RTL not working in HorizontalStackLayout #4748
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • RTL flow direction not working properly in stack layout #3779
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Windows] Wrong CarouselPage behavior scrolling items #4087
    6.0.300
  • [Android] CarouselPage not working correctly #4086
    6.0.300
  • Picker , DatePicker and TimePicker popup did not open in MacCatalyst #3748
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Auto Suggest Box - Use default control templates for WinUI3 #5144
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Project with SkiaSharp nugets is not built for iOS (error MSB6006: "ditto" exited with code 1) #5329
    6.0.300
  • Application.Current.RequestedTheme fails on WinUI with an AV #5179
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Label MaxLines doesn't work #4805
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Button release outside button area. #5457
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Review accessibility properties used in default template #5487
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] [Android] Calling Unfocus on Entry has no effect #3380
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Entry does not lose focus and keyboard does not hide #4781
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Bug] Workload ID maui is not recognized - Unable to find even a single workload #3099
  • Incorrect Frame behavior on WinUI such as shadow, margin, content position, corner radius, etc. #4804
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] VS 2022 automatic selecting wrong jdk-11 #2884
  • "Unable to load DLL 'Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Text.dll'" debugging MAUI app on Windows Machine #3167
  • .NET MAUI preview 9: Info.plist changes ignored #3240
  • [Bug] On iOS: SetUseSafeArea(true) isn't setting a safe area at the top of the screen, and doubles the safe area at the bottom of the screen #2658
  • [Bug] iOS build and deploy to mac seems slow #2997
  • Main MAUI project is not selected for deploy by default #2655
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Bug] MSBuild-Error for IOS Release Build on Windows (connected to Mac) #3321
  • Maui blazor show "no content(404)" error when NavigateTo with force load #2546
  • Android: SQLConnection.open Android: A connection was successfully established with the server, but then an error occurred during the pre-login handshake. (provider: TCP Provider, error: 35 - An internal exception was caught) #3522
  • VS 17.1.0 Preview 1.1 is using the complete absolute Path for BundleResources for SmartCopy Task for iOS #3551
  • View Transformations Not Applied on iOS #3600
  • .NET Maui application throws System.DllNotFoundException for Microsoft.ui.xaml.dll #3626
  • VerticalStackLayout doesn't pass proper constraints to its children #3654
  • Implement MenuItem API for MacCatalyst #1716
  • System Menu API support for Windows #1717
  • [Bug] Gif image not working in MAUI #5034
    6.0.300
  • [iOS]Clip property is not working properly in preview 12 #4286
    6.0.300
  • ComboBox - Use default control templates for WinUI3 #5146
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [ios] Cant set TabbedPage BarBackgroundColor in iOS 15 #4814
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • MAUI Blazor Deploy Failed #5123
    6.0.300
  • Could not set window size in Mac app #5518
  • Shell is not working in MAUI Preview 14 for iOS #5516
  • [Android] Cannot scroll vertical CollectionView #4107
  • Unable to build the latest MAUI (preview 14.0) project with VS 2022 for Mac Preview 7 (17.0 Preview, build 8001) #5499
  • The visual studio of last preview version doesn't support MAUI #5508
  • MAUI Sqlite doesn't work on Mac M1 Monterey #5269
  • Unable to install main Maui following Dev instructions #4934
  • XAML editor no longer working for MAUI library in Preview 13 #4740
  • Issue in Localization #2345
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • [Bug] Localization with Humanizer (on Android) #3992
  • [iOS] MSB4044: The "GetMlaunchArguments" task was not given a value for the required parameter "AppBundlePath". #4469
  • Injecting ViewModel to View (ContentPage) in .Net MAUI MVVM #5507
  • [Windows] CollectionView ScrollTo methods not working #4115
  • [Bug] Preview 9 breaks CollectionView update with ObservableCollection #3002
  • [Android] CollectionView ScrollTo methods not working #4110
  • iOS CollectionView thows exception when adding items to an ObservableCollection #3514
  • Undefined symbols for architecture arm64 when switching from preview13 to preview14 #5411
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • The status page does not tell you what version it's talking about #3699
  • [Bug] Windows app lifecycle overrides called multiple times on app startup #2751
  • grey titlebar on windows when using the content page #5067
  • [Enhancement] Color.FromArgb should take each component as parameters of byte #2279
    .NET 7
  • Difference between Paint and Brush #2453
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [Android] Clipping not working #4053
  • [Windows] Incorrect rendering Path and RenderTransform property not working #4047
  • [Android] Wrong position clipping layouts or image #4014
    6.0.300
  • Clip property is not working properly after MAUI preview 9 release #3081
  • [Bug] Android looks like it has a rounding different when apply Corner Radius vs iOS #2261
    6.0.300
  • [Bug] Clip is off position #2051
    6.0.200-preview.12

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure that DispatchTimer is re-started if Start() is called again. (on Windows) #5533

Merged

    6.0.300-rc.1
  • Fix issue using LineBreakMode and MaxLines at the same time #5093

  • Fix a few extension methods #5521
    6.0.300-rc.1
  • [iOS] Custom implementation in SearchBar IsEnabled property #4882
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.1
  • [iOS] Fix clipping issues #5465

  • Picker: use default ComboBox styles on WinUI 3 #5501

  • [iOS] Fix TabbedPage colors in iOS 15 #5135

Updated
